english.segment1: Praise Him in the sanctuary. Praise Him in the mighty Heavens. Praise Him. All the earth praise Him
english.segment2: Praise Him in His awesome power. Praise His great and holy name. Praise Him. The whole world praise Him
english.segment3: From the rising of the sun. Let His praise be heard. From the east to the west. And the north to south
english.segment4: Let everything that has breath. Praise the Lord forever. Let everything in my soul. Praise the Lord
